genDataTable <- function(data,met,sketch) {
  
  res <- DT::datatable(cbind(country=met[-1],sapply(data[-1,],as.numeric)),
                    rownames=F, container=sketch,
                    options = list(paging=F,searching=F,info=F,
                                   language=list(decimal=","),
                                   columnDefs = list(list(className='dt-right',targets=1:16,
                                                          defaultContent=ifelse(params$lang=="FR",
                                                                                "<i>nd</i>","<i>na</i>"))),
                                   rowCallback=DT::JS(
                                     highlightTableRowByCountry(country=c("fr","ea","eu","us","jp"),begin=0,end=16,width="1px")
                                   )
                    ),
                    class="compact hover",escape=F) %>%
  formatCurrency(columns=c(2:17),currency="",dec.mark=",",digits=1) %>%
  formatStyle(1,target="row",
              fontWeight=styleEqual(countrynameFR2EN(
                c("France","Zone euro","Union européenne","Etats-Unis","Japon")),rep("bold",2)),
              color=styleEqual(countrynameFR2EN(c("France","Zone euro","Union européenne","Etats-Unis","Japon")),
                               c(style.color.FR,style.color.EA))) %>%
  formatStyle(5, `box-shadow`='-2px 0 0 black')

  return(res)
  
}

#get data & metadata
data.y.avg.0 <- getData(data.collection,"ZEB010AD2.TXT")[[2]]
data.m.0 <- getData(data.collection,"ZEB010AD1.TXT")[[2]]
# data.y.yoy.0 <- getData(data.collection,"ZEB010AD1.TXT")[[2]]
meta <- getData(data.collection,"ZEI010AD1.TXT")[[1]]

#select series
series <- c(1, #variable
            2, #France
            3, #Germany
            4, #Austria
            5, #Belgium
            6, #Cyprus
            7, #Spain
            8, #Estonia
            9, #Finland
            10, #Greece
            11, #Ireland
            12, #Italy
            13, #Latvia
            14, #Lithuania
            15, #Luxembourg,
            16, #Malta
            17, #Netherlands
            18, #Portugal
            19, #Slovakia
            20, #Slovenia
            21, #Euro area
            22, #Bulgaria
            23, #Croatia
            24, #Denmark
            25, #Hungary
            26, #Poland
            27, #Romania
            28, #United Kingdom
            29, #Sweden
            30, #Czech Republic
            31, #European union
            32, #United States
            33)  #Japan

if (all(is.na(tail(data.y.0[,tail(series,length(series)-1)],1)))) { #if last obs is NA then shift one previous
  end <- nrow(data.y.0)-1
  begin <- end-3
  data.y <- t(data.y.0[begin:end,series])
  rm(begin,end)
} else
  data.y <- t(tail(data.y.0[,series],3))

data.m <- t(data.m.0[,series])

#set metadata:
met <- as.character(meta[2,series])
met <- trimws(unlist(lapply(strsplit(met,":"),"[[",1)))
met <- countrynameFR2EN(met)

#generate datatable:

#header:

col.m <- as.yearqtr(as.character(data.m[1,]),"%Y-%m")
col.m.y <- as.character(format(col.m,"%Y"))
col.m.m <- as.character(format(col.m,ifelse(params$lang=="FR","%m","%m")))

t <- base::table(col.m.y)
sep.style <- "box-shadow:-2px 0 0 black;"
sketch = htmltools::withTags(table(
  thead(
    tr(
      th(colspan=1,rowspan=3),
      th(colspan=3,rowspan=1,ifelse(params$lang=="FR","Moyenne annuelle","Annual average")),
      th(colspan=13,rowspan=1,ifelse(params$lang=="FR","Variation mensuelle","Monthly variation"),
         style=sep.style)
    ),
    tr(
      lapply(as.character(data.y[1,]), th, rowspan=2),
      lapply(seq_along(t),function(x){th(
        names(t)[[x]],colspan=t[x],
        style=paste0("font-weight:bold; text-align:left; border:none;",ifelse(x==1,sep.style,""))
      )})
    ),
    tr(
      lapply(utils::head(col.m.m,1), th,
             style=paste0("font-weight:normal; ",sep.style)),
      lapply(tail(col.m.m,length(col.m.m)-1), th, style="font-weight:normal; ")
    )
  )
))
rm(t,sep.style)

#end header

#data
data <- as.data.frame(cbind(data.y,data.m), stringsAsFactors=F)
t1 <- genDataTable(data,met,sketch)

#ouput the table
t1
